title: NLP engineer Remote
description: This NLP engineer position is a remote role with a focus on collecting and preprocessing large-scale text corpora to train and fine-tune language models, as well as developing prototypes and proof of concepts in LLM, NLP, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, object detection/classification, and tracking. The successful candidate should have experience in data analysis and be able to identify patterns, trends, and insights to inform model development and improvement. Skills used includes NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.
